title: Floor Lamp, ca. 1938
provenance:
Doris Duke Charitable Foundation; 2009: acquired by Museum [1]











[1] Acquired for the Hollywood Wing of Duke Farms. The addition of 1938, designed by  Thomas W. Lamb (1871-1942) for Doris Duke. For a fuller history of the building, see Greg Herringshaw's history of the house in the justification for the six window shades from the same wing. (5969.2-7.2009). It has been in the wing until sent for donation by the Doris Duke Charitable Foundation to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Doris Duke Charitable Foundation
description: Three-tiered conical lamp with spaces between the tiers to reveal light, on a reeded stem descending to a circular base.
